title: Ticket #5326: *_EXPRS should be uniformly replaced with *_ATTRS
description:
From HTCondor-users:

  Condor's version is 8.4.0. Are some configurations incompatible with the Condor's latest release? The configuration in my configure: "STARTD_EXPRS = $(STARTD_EXPRS) DedicatedScheduler Location IsOwner". Thereis a warning in startlog file. WARNING: config contains obsolete STARTD_EXPRS or SLOT_TYPE_n_STARTD_EXPRS which will be (partially) ignored! use STARTD_ATTRS instead.

We need to add another entry in the upgrading from 8.2 to 8.4 section.
remarks:
2015-Oct-20 21:35:23 by tim:
We should probably eradicate STARTD_EXPRS from our examples on our Wiki pages.

2015-Oct-26 17:39:51 by tim:
CODE REVIEW: Greg and I approve this change
check_ins:
2015-Oct-26 17:37   Check-in [46116]: Fix typo in manual for #5326. Add version history for #5343. Update version history for #5131. Set release date in manual. Update RPM build script for final release. (By Tim Theisen )
2015-Oct-22 16:41   Check-in [46080]: fix fedora warning for #5326 (By John (TJ) Knoeller )
2015-Oct-22 16:29   Check-in [46079]: fix to doc,examples and code to support and prefer *_ATTRS over *_EXPRS. #5326 this includes STARTD_ATTRS, STARTD_SLOT_ATTRS, STARTD_JOB_ATTRS & SUBMIT_ATTRS for each of these *_EXPRS is also allows and if both are used, the result is the union of the two. Defaults for STARTD_ATTRS & STARTD_JOB_ATTRS [...] (By John (TJ) Knoeller )
creator: tim
